816620.name: Ascender - Original Soundtrack & Artbook
816620.description:
This DLC package contains the Ascender's original soundtrack and artbook. Ascender's original soundtrack consists of 8 unique track that specifically composed based on each district of Dolopo. The artbook filled with hand-drawn art featuring all major character, the districts, and other items & sprites.

The included soundtracks are
  • 01.Metallic Knight - Theme Song of Ascender
  • 02. The City Beneath - Theme of Dolopo
  • 03. Underhill - Theme of Mustang
  • 04. Calming the Qualms - Theme of Everest
  • 05. Desert of Loneliness - Theme of Helion
  • 06. Batuan Hitam - Theme of Ranesh
  • 07. Ignis Chorum - Theme of Rajumla
  • 08. Tip 'n' Toe - Theme of Hymla
